messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name: '. I will derive this data from the following paragraph: Investigator Lewis, with the assistance of Chauffer Rodney Robinson, placed the decedent in a body bag after rolling them over. Technician Muhammad collected a 9mm Luger casing at the scene. Sergeant McMullen briefed Detective Morton on the blood trail leading from the crime scene. Crime Lab Technician Tamika Rogers conducted gunshot residue tests on the eyewitnesses, Darceleen Commodore and Earlitta Taylor. Detective David Trehan's report from the Coroner's Office classified the deaths as homicides. Detective Morton met with Darceleen Commodore, who identified one of the perpetrators as Kendall Gordon. Detective Aucoin secured the residence after the initial investigation. Detective Sergeant Chris Robert, Officer Juan Lopez, Officers Phil Burras & Quincy Broaden, Officers Nate Addison & Glen Hewitt, Detective Gregory Johnson, Detective Jason McGee, Detective Ananie Mitchell, and Detective Melvin McCullum were all involved in various capacities in the investigation. Detective Pratt from the Homicide Section was assigned to a related crime scene. Detective Mathews and Detective Orlando Mathews compiled photographic line-ups for witness identification. Scientific Criminal Investigations Division Officer Gary Sallienger was involved in sketching the crime scene. Orleans Parish Coroner's Office Investigator Parnell Williams processed the scene.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.

Officer Name: Investigator LewisOfficer Context: Assisted by Rodney Robinson, he placed the decedent in a body bag after rolling them over.Officer Role: InvestigatorOfficer Name: Chauffer Rodney RobinsonOfficer Context: Assisted Investigator Lewis in handling the decedent's body.Officer Role: ChaufferOfficer Name: Technician MuhammadOfficer Context: Collected a 9mm Luger casing at the crime scene.Officer Role: TechnicianOfficer Name: Sergeant McMullenOfficer Context: Briefed Detective Morton on the blood trail leading from the crime scene.Officer Role: SergeantOfficer Name: Crime Lab Technician Tamika RogersOfficer Context: Conducted gunshot residue tests on the eyewitnesses Darceleen Commodore and Earlitta Taylor.Officer Role: Crime Lab TechnicianOfficer Name: Detective David TrehanOfficer Context: His report from the Coroner's Office classified the deaths as homicides.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Detective MortonOfficer Context: Was briefed by Sergeant McMullen and met with eyewitness Darceleen Commodore for investigation purposes.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Detective AucoinOfficer Context: Secured the residence after the initial investigation.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Detective Sergeant Chris RobertOfficer Context: Involved in the investigation in an unspecified capacity.Officer Role: Detective SergeantOfficer Name: Officer Juan LopezOfficer Context: Involved in the investigation in an unspecified capacity.Officer Role: OfficerOfficer Name: Officers Phil Burras & Quincy BroadenOfficer Context: Involved in the investigation as a team in an unspecified capacity.Officer Role: OfficersOfficer Name: Officers Nate Addison & Glen HewittOfficer Context: Involved in the investigation as a team in an unspecified capacity.Officer Role: OfficersOfficer Name: Detective Gregory JohnsonOfficer Context: Involved in the investigation in an unspecified capacity.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Detective Jason McGeeOfficer Context: Involved in the investigation in an unspecified capacity.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Detective Ananie MitchellOfficer Context: Involved in the investigation in an unspecified capacity.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Detective Melvin McCullumOfficer Context: Involved in the investigation in an unspecified capacity.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Detective PrattOfficer Context: Assigned to a related crime scene from the Homicide Section.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Detective MathewsOfficer Context: Compiled photographic line-ups for witness identification along with Detective Orlando Mathews.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Detective Orlando MathewsOfficer Context: Compiled photographic line-ups for witness identification along with Detective Mathews.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Scientific Criminal Investigations Division Officer Gary SalliengerOfficer Context: Involved in sketching the crime scene.Officer
